snippet: Recent developments in Egypt have brought United States policy makers closer than ever to a confronting a situation that has haunted American relations with Egypt for more than 30 years: a government truly controlled by the Islamists of the Muslim...
abstract: Recent developments in Egypt have brought United States policy makers closer than ever to a confronting a situation that has haunted American relations with Egypt for more than 30 years: a government truly controlled by the Islamists of the Muslim Brotherhood.

headline.main: Changes Atop Egypt's Government Create Uncertain Path for United States
